content.raw:
It failed on the `gazebo-ci-default-trusty-amd64-gpu-nvidia` job 3 out of the last 4 runs. I can reproduce it locally too. 

Failure log:

~~~
515: [ RUN      ] CameraSensor.WorldReset
515: [Msg] Waiting for master.
515: [Msg] Connected to gazebo master @ http://127.0.0.1:11345
515: [Msg] Publicized address: 172.17.0.2
515: [Dbg] [ServerFixture.cc:202] ServerFixture load in 0.9 seconds, timeout after 600 seconds
515: /var/lib/jenkins/workspace/gazebo-ci-default-trusty-amd64-gpu-nvidia/gazebo/test/integration/camera_sensor.cc:122: Failure
515: Expected: (dt.Double()) > (1.0), actual: 0.50365 vs 1
515: [Dbg] [ServerFixture.cc:128] ServerFixture::Unload
515: [  FAILED  ] CameraSensor.WorldReset (3658 ms)
~~~

It seems to have started since pull request #2541 was merged.

@chapulina , @caguero , @nkoenig
